title: Start
dingeropts
body:
{Player}
[[Get sympathy for Corey|coreysympathy]]
[[Go in on Carey|attackcarey]]
[[Shame them both|shame]]

title: coreysympathy
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Corey, I feel for you, I really do. You're a boy ripped in two. But you're a fighter and I believe in you.

[[...|coreyquestions]]
<<AudienceReaction|neutral>>

title: coreyq1
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Corey, what can your brother do to win you back over to his side? I get the feeling he wants to make amends.

[[...|coreya1]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>

title: coreya1
coreya1b
body:
{CoreyMcCormack}
Yeah, that's right, he's gotta play soccer with me. And drink sodas! If he's truly Carey, my twin brother, he'll send me my favourite Tik-tok meme, right now!

[[...|tiktok]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>

title: tiktok
body:
{Player}
[[Ask another question|coreyquestions]]
[[Get Carey to send a Tik-tok meme|tiktok2]]
<<AudienceReaction|neutral>>

title: tiktok2
body:
{JoeyDinger}
Well, Carey, how about it? All you have to do is get out your phone and send a video to your brother. Think you can do that?

[[...|careytiktok]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>

title: careytiktok
careytiktok2
careytiktok5
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
I may have a little confession to make.

[[...|careyconfession]]
<<AudienceReaction|surprised>>

title: careyconfession
body:
{CareyMcCormack}
I haven't been totally honest with you Joey.

[[...|careyconfession2]]
<<AudienceReaction|mad>>
